# multipleRoutesDetected

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the object detects more than one playback route.

## Declaration

```swift
var multipleRoutesDetected: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The system posts a [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVRouteDetectorMultipleRoutesDetectedDidChangeNotification] notification when this property value changes.

## Detecting routes

- **detectsCustomRoutes**: A Boolean value that indicates whether route detection includes custom routes.
- **isRouteDetectionEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether route detection is in an enabled state.
- **AVRouteDetectorMultipleRoutesDetectedDidChange**: A notification the system posts when changes occur to its detected routes.
